html:
5.20.17  9:46 pm   Would you leave Earth given the chance, or is Earth too cool

     maybe if there was another inhabitable planet, with similar amenities, breathable air, etc

5.20.17  9:31 pm   How does it feel to have (apparently) no/few irl friends and an army of anonymous strangers questioning how you live your life at all times?

     normal

5.20.17  9:18 pm   is capitalization a crime?

     no

5.20.17  8:35 pm   have you ever actually been to new canaan ct like in one of your songs?

     yes, only once, when i wrote that song

5.20.17  8:34 pm   have you ever played Cm9add6add4addb9addb5(+11)(b13)/E5 and G7b13#11#9b9sus4/F, Donaudampfschifffahrtselektrizitatenhauptbetriebswerkbauunterbeamtengesellschaft?

     i think so

5.20.17  8:25 pm   How do i become true dank?

     you were surely born that way

5.20.17  8:15 pm   what time was it where you are when this question was submitted?

     8:15 pm

5.20.17  8:05 pm   what would you do if you some how finished everything you have written?

     go on vacation. and then write more

5.20.17  8:02 pm   will you ever hold a competition for best question?

     every question is the best question, at the time it is asked

5.20.17  7:53 pm   will you ever write an autobiography?

     oh hell yeah. i have done it many times but it is unedited and not released yet

5.20.17  7:41 pm   I want to make a living off of creating abstract art, dance, poetry, and possibly own music later on (I don't currently have the resources to record good audio.) and posting it on the internet. Do you think this is feasible? I would like to try either way, but I feel like it would be good to know what you think. Should I have a back up plan?

     if you really want to make the kind of material you want to make, you will need to find a separate way to earn a living. it might be handy to try to use your special skills as an advantage in finding a job, but if you really want to be free to make the kind of material you want, you are going to want to eliminate the immediate pressure to have it earn money. otherwise you will be forced to completely change what you do in order to follow the money, and it might cause you to be mad at the world. so i recommend getting any kind of work you can, and then in the remaining time work toward exactly where you want to go
5.20.17  7:35 pm   how do you work through artblock/musicblock/writersblock/inspirationblock/depression?

5.20.17  7:29 pm   What cool tricks do you use to avoid using uppercase letters whenever people give you instrctions on how to use uppercase letters?

     on my keyboard i can use capital or lowercase letters any time i want. i continue to use both in ways that i think are reasonable to communicate. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.20.17  7:27 pm   do you know how much money your two biggest videos would make w/ads?

     oh yes, i am aware that it's a frighteningly huge amount. i receive offers on a regular basis from companies offering ridiculous sums of money up front to buy ad rights from me. and i also get harassed by the fans many times a day. so the pressure and guilt is enourmous. but every time i see an ad, i am immediately reminded vividly that i will never rent out my audience to advertisers

      its about 8$ per 1000 views. its cool you dont put them though, it would take away from the beginning, especially a long ad.

5.20.17  7:19 pm   Are you operating at peak efficiency?

     yes
5.20.17  7:03 pm   what do you think of microtonal music? do you have any plans to incorporate microtones in your work?

5.20.17  6:57 pm   Are you going to go on hiatus again?

     i have never gone on hiatus
5.20.17  6:40 pm   On a scale from 1 - 10 what is your favourite colour of the alphabet?

5.20.17  6:34 pm   there are so many things and i am really enjoying the amount of things! :) what about you?

     i know what you mean

5.20.17  6:08 pm   how many baboons is too many?

     it depends how many you want
5.20.17  5:47 pm   is the time next to a question on the questions page the time the question was asked or the time you answered the question

5.20.17  5:43 pm   how do you deal with existing?

     like this

5.20.17  5:32 pm   can I hire you for a project?

     i am not available for hire

5.20.17  5:30 pm   do you separate your personal life (friends, relationships, fun) from your work

     they are the same

5.20.17  5:18 pm   When I make something I always see flaws when I view it again. In terms of the "history of" videos do you have the same feeling? If so what are some things that you would like to change?

     everything will still have flaws no matter how many you fix. you just have to decide when it's time to stop. i haven't watched the history videos since they were released
5.20.17  5:08 pm   why wont u answer any of my questions buttface
5.20.17  4:19 pm   What's your favorite meme my fellow homosapien?

5.20.17  4:10 pm   is ok to be alive?

     oh hell yeah!

5.20.17  4:02 pm   You mess around a bit with mixed meter here and there, like in Goo Soup. Can we expect more crazy rhythic stunts in the coming songs?

     oh hell yeah! also normal friendly rhythms as well

5.20.17  3:57 pm   What time is it when you answer this question

     5:08 pm

5.20.17  3:52 pm   if you put all of the titles to your videos together, is there a secret hidden message?

     no
5.20.17  3:35 pm   is this a good question

5.20.17  3:34 pm   is there even an answer to this question

     yes

5.20.17  3:34 pm   What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail? Also, you are loved.

     if you know you can't fail then i wouldn't really call that an 'attempt'

5.20.17  3:10 pm   http://www.billwurtz.com/questions/favorite-joke.html can you explain how the time space continuum is a joke?

     everything is in a certain place. surprise! everything is in a different place. when? now!.... and now! but the nows are both different. which seems impossible, but the bigger joke is that it also seems impossible for it to not be this way

5.20.17  2:58 pm   What do you have against capitalizing stuff

     nothing
5.20.17  2:42 pm   What do you do on your free time besides make such quality content? Do you, perhaps, have any favourite TV shows?

5.20.17  1:55 pm   why are you bad at life?

     i am not, but i respect your opinion

5.20.17  12:53 pm   Do you love to wear shirts?

     oh hell yeah

5.20.17  12:50 pm   do you say oh hell yeah when you strongly agree on something?

     yes

5.20.17  12:49 pm   did you notice that most people here are now asking questions in lower case because you rarely use uppercase

     people have always used capitals and lowercase in their questions

5.20.17  12:45 pm   What is an adventure?

     it's like when you explore and have fun at the same time

5.20.17  12:22 pm   do you ever randomly answer questions you were asked a long time ago?

     yes

5.20.17  11:30 am   why isn't "what is love" a redirect to the video?

     people were asking that way before the video came out, and i used to have an answer for it, but now it's impossible to tell if they're asking it without knowledge of the video or if they are just quoting the video
5.20.17  10:43 am   Are you ever going to post again on the "reality" section of your website? Would like to know whats happening in your life.

5.20.17  10:16 am   What is your favorite part in hotewig?

     the part where i actually managed to finish it, during my life time

5.20.17  9:42 am   does life have to be biological?

     bio means life, but i guess the word could change

5.20.17  9:42 am   hypotethically, if i was a millionaire who really liked your stuff, could i persuade you to create custom songs/videos for just me.

     i don't think so

     of course, you could continue doing videos you wanna do

     yes, but much slower

     but you'd have to make like a video a month just for me.

     exactly

     i would hypotethically pay you thousands of dollars per video

5.20.17  9:25 am   What's your favorite month?

     the current month, because it holds the most possibilities, and opportunities

5.20.17  9:06 am   Are you really aware of everything you're doing

     yes

     or are you just making completely random stuff?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable
